channel.title: rabbitmq on YT Por
channel.description: Recent content in rabbitmq on YT Por

item.title: RabbitMQ can not login with guest/guest
item.description: After a fresh install of RabbitMQ, I have encountered a Login Failed error when trying to access the RabbitMQ Management console at http://localhost:15672 Here’s one possible solution to overcome this issue. Create a file /etc/rabbitmq/rabbitmq.config, and add the below content into that file. [{rabbit, [{loopback_users, []}]}]. Restart the service to apply the changes.
